option.name: description
option.value:
A simple application to calculate largest palindrome number between two numbers.
A JavaFx project with UI designed using the Javafx scene builder.
How to use this system !
Start the applicaiton.
Write the upper and lower bound of digit in the text box.
Hit the search button!
If these are the valid number then the system calculates the largest Palindrome and display it otherwise error message is shown.
Thank you for using the system! Any comments or complements regarding it is always appreciated!
